name: Puzzle 9998
description:
puzzle 9998

Puzzle inspired by the classic 15 puzzle, where you move tiles to order a sequence of numbers.

In this EPIC version, you have 4 boards with 123456789, and you can TELEPORT between the boards.

Use MOUSE CLICK to move a tile into the empty slot!

You can move a tile adjacent to the empty space or a tile that is in the same spot, but on adjacent board to the empty space.

Move blue tiles to the blue board, green tiles to the green board, and so on.

Make sure to MAKE A COMMENT in the comment section below!!1!!1!
Post a screenshot!
Feedback appreciated :)
